    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String phone, java.lang.String email, int goals, boolean goalie)
      The addPlayer method creates a new Player object and adds it to an arraylist of Player objects.
      Parameters:
      name - This is the first parameter for the addPlayer function, it represents the player name.
      phone - This is the second parameter for the addPlayer function, it represents the player phone number.
      email - This is the third parameter for the addPlayer function, it represents the player email.
      goals - This is the fourth parameter for the addPlayer function, it represents the player goals.
      goalie - This is the fifth parameter for the addPlayer function, it represents the player goalie status.

    • load

      public void load() throws java.sql.SQLException
      The load method loads the soccer league information from a database.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - The database was configured incorrectly or not running.
